#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Be Organised ( for Teens )
#Text=Seeing a mess in your space is always a big put-off , and it 's always tempting to procrastinate and typically ' leave it for later ' .
#Text=Hate not knowing how to navigate your own room ?
#Text=Read more to find out how to get rid of these annoying things .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Cleaning Your Room
#Text=Clean that cupboard .
#Text=Basically , take out your clothes drawer by drawer , folding them into neat piles according to them ( shirts , tank tops , shorts etc ) .
#Text=When your closet is completely empty , allocate clothes to each drawer/section and put them in accordingly .
#Text=Organize your desk .
#Text=For this , this is pretty similar to cleaning your cupboard , the most efficient way is to completely empty your desk , put all your stuff in piles on your bed .
#Text=In your mind make a little plan for where you 'll put everything , then carefully refill your desk neatly .
#Text=Make your bed .
#Text=It 's not that hard , and it 'll make you feel better about your room .
#Text=It wo n't look right if you have a perfect room except for a bed that resembles a disaster zone .
#Text=Have a nice floor .
#Text=Do n't have underwear or any other things beside furniture littering your floor .
#Text=If your hands get messy from cleaning , wear gloves .
#Text=Use boxes .
#Text=If you have a bit of stuff that you do n't use that much , but too precious to you that you ca n't throw it away , allocate a box for all this stuff and guess what you do now ?
#Text=Fill it .
#Text=When done , label your box and put it subtly in a corner .
#Text=Organizing School Stuff
#Text=Organize those school books .
#Text=When you take your textbooks home , it 's better if you have a nice little box or magazine holder thing so you can keep your books organized , neat and easy to reach .
#Text=Clean out that pencil case .
#Text=Empty your pencil case onto your desk or a table .
#Text=Sort out your things , throw out out broken pens or other items and if you have an unnecessarily large amount of something , use only a few for school .
#Text=Use elastic bands or spare hair-ties to organize if you need it .
#Text=Have a strong and suitable school bag .
#Text=A good one should be about to fit in all of your books and laptop ( if you need/have one ) , do n't let it be so small you need to carry something else to occupy your hands .
#Text=Preparing Ahead of Time
#Text=Get ready every night before going to bed .
#Text=Prepare your school bag every night before you go to sleep , if you take a packed lunch , you could prepare it the night before and put it in the fridge overnight to put in the next morning .
#Text=Prepare your uniform .
#Text=Each night lay out some fresh clothes/your uniform for the next day and other things you need .
#Text=Tips
#Text=When you 're finished with something , make sure you put it away immediately .
#Text=When you get changed into your nightclothes , do n't leave them on the floor , put them in the laundry basket straight away .
